title: Super Bowl LIV position-by-position breakdown, Who has the edge: Chiefs or 49ers? (Football 1/29)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn and Bryant McFadden on Radio Row in South Beach to give a position-by-position breakdown for Super Bowl LIV (2:15). The guys answer if the Chiefs or 49ers have the edge at each unit. Tuesday's video version of the Pick Six podcast on CBS Sports HQ featured 3-time Super Bowl champ and former NFL executive Scott Pioli (28:00) who discussed the remarkable story of 49ers assistant coach Katie Sowers, minority coaches in the NFL, as well as the San Francisco's plan to slow down Kansas City and Patrick Mahomes on Sunday (42:00). Also from Radio Row, an interview with Cowboys quarterback Dak Prescott (55:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
